hotels.name: Super 8 Speedway/University
hotels.description: Just off Interstate 85, this hotel features free Wi-Fi and a daily continental breakfast with hot waffles. The Charlotte Motor Speedway is a 15 minute drive from the hotel.

hotels.name: Omni Charlotte Hotel
hotels.description: The Omni Charlotte Hotel envelopes you in ultimate comfort with a signature touch of genuine North Carolina hospitality.

hotels.name: Charlotte Marriott City Center
hotels.description: Located in Uptown Charlotte, this Marriott City Center hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi in public areas. Facilities include a 24-hour fitness centre. Parking is offered for a fee.

hotels.name: The Ivey's Hotel
hotels.description: This luxury boutique hotel is located in Downtown Charlotte and features a complimentary continental breakfast in the Library Lounge and free WiFi. The Mint Museum of Craft Design is 100 metres away.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton, Charlotte
hotels.description: In the heart of downtown Charlotte, The Ritz-Carlton, Charlotte has luxurious rooms with a 42' flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Facilities include an indoor pool and spa

hotels.name: Aloft Charlotte Uptown at the EpiCentre
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Uptown Charlotte, this boutique hotel features on-site dining and live entertainment. An indoor pool and free Wi-Fi are provided. A Charlotte light rail station is adjacent to the property.

hotels.name: Courtyard Charlotte City Center
hotels.description: Located in the heart of downtown Charlotte, North Carolina, this hotel is within walking distance of Blumenthal Performing Arts Center and features a skyline pool and free in-room Wi-Fi.

hotels.name: Facilities of SpringHill Suites by Marriott Charlotte Uptown
hotels.description: Located 201 m from Mint Museum of Craft Design in Charlotte, SpringHill Suites by Marriott Charlotte Uptown features free WiFi access and private parking.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Charlotte-Center City
hotels.description: Located in the city centre of Charlotte, North Carolina, surrounded by local attractions including the Charlotte Convention Center, this hotel features an on-site restaurant and a modern, rooftop pool offering city views.

hotels.name: Dunhill Hotel
hotels.description: Centrally in downtown Charlotte, this historic hotel has been open since 1929 and features unique architecture. Complimentary expanded continental breakfast, free Wi-Fi, and luxurious rooms with a flat-screen TV are provided.

hotels.name: Kimpton Tryon Park Hotel
hotels.description: Set in the Downtown Charlotte district in Charlotte, 400 metres from Epicenter, Kimpton Tryon Park Hotel features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

hotels.name: Hilton Charlotte Center City
hotels.description: Ideally located in the center of Charlotte city center, this hotel is directly across from the Charlotte Convention Center and features a large variety of modern services and state-of-the-art amenities.
